version_description:
Revamped player interface
- You can now choose any image from your photo library as a new skin and it will be set as the background of the player (try it out).
- Landscape mode now takes advantage of the entire width of the device
- Tapping the various GUI elements (such as the clock and speaker image) will hide and unhide them
- Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- iPad users on iOS 8 can choose skins now (bug fix)
- Updated station database
- Fixed a bug that caused some users to see ads in the app.

Revamped player interface
- You can now choose any image from your photo library as a new skin and it will be set as the background of the player (try it out).
- Landscape mode now takes advantage of the entire width of the device
- Tapping the various GUI elements (such as the clock and speaker image) will hide and unhide them
- Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- iPad users on iOS 8 can choose skins now (bug fix)
- Updated station database
- Fixed a bug that caused some users to see ads in the app.

Revamped player interface
- You can now choose any image from your photo library as a new skin and it will be set as the background of the player (try it out).
- Landscape mode now takes advantage of the entire width of the device
- Tapping the various GUI elements (such as the clock and speaker image) will hide and unhide them
- Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- iPad users on iOS 8 can choose skins now (bug fix)
- Updated station database
- Fixed a bug that caused some users to see ads in the app.

- Added iPhone X screen format
- Added listener and bitrate count to each listed station when browsing stations.
- Added ability to edit Favorites. Just tap Edit on the top-right of the main menu and then tap on the favorite you want to edit to do so.

- Added iPhone X screen format
- Added listener and bitrate count to each listed station when browsing stations.

- Added listener and bitrate count to each listed station when browsing stations.

Updated graphics for the latest device screen sizes

- New app icon for the Pro users
- Updated graphics for the latest devices
- Fixed the record button

- New feeds added

New “Feeds with Active Alerts” feature that shows you feeds with interesting on-going activity happening right now along with a description of the alert and feed. Various bug fixes and app improvements.

New “Feeds with Active Alerts” feature that shows you feeds with interesting on-going activity happening right now along with a description of the alert and feed. Various bug fixes and app improvements.

New “Feeds with Active Alerts” feature that shows you feeds with interesting on-going activity happening right now along with a description of the alert and feed. Various bug fixes and app improvements.

Fixed non-scanner radio feeds. Dark Mode is now available. App is now better at restarting the feed when disconnected. The audio will restart if you're on the player screen (the one with the play button) when disconnected. It will still work even if the app is placed in the background. If you're on another screen, such as a menu, the audio will not restart if you're disconnected for a long period of time. This should fix the issue where the feeds disconnect after a few minutes when on the cellular network.

Fixed non-scanner radio feeds. Dark Mode is now available. App is now better at restarting the feed when disconnected. The audio will restart if you're on the player screen (the one with the play button) when disconnected. It will still work even if the app is placed in the background. If you're on another screen, such as a menu, the audio will not restart if you're disconnected for a long period of time. This should fix the issue where the feeds disconnect after a few minutes when on the cellular network.

Fixed non-scanner radio feeds. Dark Mode is now available. App is now better at restarting the feed when disconnected. The audio will restart if you're on the player screen (the one with the play button) when disconnected. It will still work even if the app is placed in the background. If you're on another screen, such as a menu, the audio will not restart if you're disconnected for a long period of time. This should fix the issue where the feeds disconnect after a few minutes when on the cellular network.

Fixed issue with the app crashing in rare circumstances while listening to the feed for longer periods of time. Made the tabbed buttons more visible. Optimized the code to make the app much smaller in size and run faster.

Fixed issue with the app crashing in rare circumstances while listening to the feed for longer periods of time. Made the tabbed buttons more visible. Optimized the code to make the app much smaller in size and run faster.

Fixed issue with the app crashing in rare circumstances while listening to the feed for longer periods of time. Made the tabbed buttons more visible. Optimized the code to make the app much smaller in size and run faster.
Added the ability to auto-open to a certain page or feed when starting up the app. Check out the app's settings to change it.
Added the ability to auto-open to a certain page or feed when starting up the app. Check out the app's settings to change it.
Added the ability to auto-open to a certain page or feed when starting up the app. Check out the app's settings to change it.
Fixed a bug where the background image chosen sometimes did not save or was in the wrong orientation. Also added measures to reduce echoing.
Fixed a bug where the background image chosen sometimes did not save or was in the wrong orientation. Also added measures to reduce echoing.
Fixed a bug where the background image chosen sometimes did not save or was in the wrong orientation. Also added measures to reduce echoing.

Updated for compatibility with the latest iOS. New graphics changes. Automatically retries to connect to a server even when it wasn't able to in the first attempt (change the retry rate in the app's settings). App no longer freezes when a server is slow to respond.
